Upcoming Events
scroll down
Plantation Resort in Crystal River
From tournaments to sunset cruises, you can count on an exciting calendar of upcoming Crystal River, Florida events with Plantation Resort on Crystal River. Weekly drink specials, live music performances, curated menus, and other Central Florida attractions and happenings await you and your group at the resort.
Please check back as we add events as they come up!

Meetings & Events
scroll down
Meetings Overview
Request Proposal
Event Space in Crystal River Florida
A Memorable Setting for Meetings & More
Plan the ultimate group getaway beside Kings Bay. With 12,000 square feet of indoor meeting space and 38,000 square feet of outdoor event space in Crystal River, Florida, plus unique access to one-of-a-kind activities in the natural landscape, Plantation Resort on Crystal River offers an outstanding venue for family reunions, corporate gatherings, social retreats, fishing trips, and more.
Request Information
Corporate Groups
Let the abundance of nature around our resort inspire your business group or corporate gathering of up to 375 attendees to meet goals and make greater achievements. From seminars to conferences and executive trips, Plantation Resort on Crystal River is the ideal locale for you and your colleagues.
Retreats
Plantation Resort on Crystal River offers groups an exclusive way to connect with nature and experience Florida’s vibrant wildlife first-hand, making it an exceptional destination for retreats of every kind. Bring your group along for unparalleled team-building and experiences.
Social Events
From golf and fishing to swimming with the manatees, our resort offers a special place to bond over activities you love. Family outings and groups celebrating special occasions can get together and make priceless memories by the natural beauty of Kings Bay.
Where We Are
Plantation Resort on Crystal River is located about 70 miles north of Tampa International Airport, which is just over a one-hour drive away. Members of your group who are traveling should plan on flying there for the quickest experience. In addition, Orlando International Airport is just under two hours from the resort.
